Title: Kappa no Kui Kuo Kua
Description: ['Music video for the song ', Kappa no Kui Kuo Kua, " by Japanese vocal group Duke Aces and actress Nobue Ichitani that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Yoji Kuri.", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' The video aired in 1975, but was considered lost media some time later. It was recovered thanks to the Minna no Uta Hakkutsu Project.']
